name: try-picoruby
description: Browser-based PicoRuby simulator with Wokwi-like UI

scripts.build: npm run copy:wasm && tsc && vite build
scripts.copy:wasm: mkdir -p public/wasm && cp node_modules/fatfs-wasm/assets/ff_single-*.wasm public/wasm/ff_single.wasm && cp node_modules/fatfs-wasm/assets/ff_multi-*.wasm public/wasm/ff_multi.wasm
